long_description: Push for perfection with the durable, hypoallergenic TYR La Vengadora Swim Cap. This soft, light, nonslip swim cap is easy to put on and take off, and withstands long hours of use. Constructed with 100% silicone, the TYR La Vengadora Swim Cap protects your hair while reducing drag in the water and maximizing your speed.
short_description: Push for perfection with the durable, hypoallergenic TYR La Vengadora Swim Cap. This soft, light, nonslip swim cap is easy to put on and take off, and withstands long hours of use.
